Meeting of Juche idea study organizations held in DPRK 
    Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Delegations of Juche idea study organizations on a visit to the DPRK held a meeting for exchanging experiences at the people's palace of culture yesterday.
 Present there were director general Vishwanath, honorary director general Shuhachi Inoue and secretary general Kenichi Ogami of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, and members of the delegations and personages of organizations for the study of the Juche idea.    
 They exchanged the successes and experiences gained in the work for study and dissemination of the Juche idea.

Government delegations of Russia and Democratic Congo arrive 
    Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- A Russian government delegation led by V.M. Filippov, Minister of Education who is the chairman of the russian side of the Russian-DPRK Intergovernmental Economic Cooperation Committee, arrived here today by air to participate in the 3rd meeting of the committee for cooperation in trade, economy, science and technology between the governments of the DPRK and the Russian federation.
 Arriving was also a government delegation of the Democratic Republic of Congo led by Yerodia Abdulaye Ndombassy, Minister of State for Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation.

articles.title: Executive director of KEDO arrives
articles.content:
Talks between FMs of DPRK and Democratic Congo 
    Pyongyang, October 17 (KCNA) -- Talks were held here today between Paek Nam Sun, Minister of Foreign Affairs of the DPRK, and Yerodia Abdulaye Ndombassy, Minister of State for  Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation of Democratic Congo.
 At the talks the two sides informed each other of the situation of their countries and exchanged views on the issue of further developing the friendly relations between the two countries and a series of matters of common concern.
